import axios from 'axios'; const fetchPortfolio = () =>{ const query = ` query Portfolios { portfolios { _id, title company companyWebsite } }`; return axios.post('http://localhost:3000/graphql', {query}) .then(({data: graph}) => graph.data) .then(data => data.portfolios) } const Portfolios = ({porfolios}) =>{ return( <>

Portfolios

{JSON.stringify(porfolios)}

) } Portfolios.getInitialProps = async () =>{ const porfolios = await fetchPortfolio() return { ...porfolios } } export default Portfolios
